entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
